channel.title: Requirements and trimming for skill capes
channel.description:
How i do these next things : -When a guy gets 2 skills to 100, they get their skill capes trimmed -How i change untrimmed and trimmed skill capes requirements?
Base is Project Czar

item.title: Requirements and trimming for skill capes
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Client.java search for:

Public void GetCL####

In the #### put the skill requirement you want.
Then you’ll see something like:

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == ##### { return @@; }

The ItemID is obvious, its the ID that you are add a requirement to.

The return @@, @@ is the level requirement.
And GetCLAttack is the skill required.

Read full topic
item.source: Requirements and trimming for skill capes
